channel.title: Command for switch to ancients
channel.description: whats the command to switch to ancinets i know its ::switch but whats the command i add in client.java

item.title: Command for switch to ancients
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

well if u put this for a alter that switches to ancients

search

 public void parseIncomingPackets() {

thats the void
put this under that void someware

if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 0) { emotes = 2; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic."); } else if (objectID == 6552 && ancients == 1) { emotes = 0; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic."); }

then create the alter (the id is 6552) at home or something
